alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:32AM CDT until August 02 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CEDAR AND MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 532 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Era, or 8 miles east of Muscatine, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Muscatine, Durant, West Liberty, Wilton, Fruitland, Atalissa, Rochester, Fairport, Montpelier, Stockton, Clark`s Ferry Recreation Area, Muscatine County Fairgrounds, Midway Beach, New Era, Pleasant Prairie, Moscow, Fairport Recreation Area, Wildcat Den State Park, Saulsbury Bridge Campground and Shady Creek Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
